Package iscteiul.ista

package iscteiul.ista
  • Class
    Description
    App
    The main entry point of the ES-Project-TerritoryManagement application.
    AppUI
    A Swing-based user interface for the ES-Project-TerritoryManagement application.
    CSVFileReader
    Utility class for reading property data from CSV files.
    CSVFileWriter
    A utility class responsible for exporting a list of PropertyRecord objects into a CSV file using semicolons as the delimiter.
    CSVMetricsFileReader
    CSVMetricsFileReader
    ExportToGephiUtils
    Demonstrates exporting a subset of PropertyRecord data (filtered by parish) to a GEXF file for use in Gephi, using the GraphStream library.
    GeometryUtils
    A utility class for parsing WKT geometry strings and checking spatial relationships using JTS.
    Graph
    A Graph representation where each node is a property (with selected attributes), and edges connect properties that are adjacent (touching) based on their geometry.
    Graph.GraphNode
    An inner class representing a "node" in the graph.
    GraphVisualization
    The GraphVisualization class provides methods to visualize a PropertyGraph using the GraphStream library.
    MergedPropertyGraph
    Builds a graph of "merged properties" where each vertex is a property (resulting from merging same-owner polygons), and an edge indicates these two merged properties are neighbors (their polygons touch).
    OwnerGraph
    Represents a graph of owners, where each node is an owner (identified by owner ID), and edges indicate that these owners have at least one pair of adjacent properties.
    ParishMetrics
    Immutable value-object representing one row from parish-metrics.csv.
    PostGISUtils
    PostGISUtils – Bulk Loader and Neighbor Finder
    PropertyGraph
    The PropertyGraph class constructs and manages a graph of PropertyRecord objects, where edges represent adjacency (shared boundaries) between properties.
    PropertyMerger
    Utility class for merging properties of the same owner that share boundaries, resulting in one "merged" property per connected component.
    PropertyRecord
    Represents an immutable record of a property, including its geometry, area, ownership, and location details (parish, municipality, island).
    PropertySwapAdvisor
    PropertySwapAdvisor
    PropertyUtils
    A stateless utility class providing helper methods to work with PropertyRecord objects.
    SwapSuggestion
    Represents a potential swap between two properties (p1 and p2), along with the associated benefit, cost, and overall score of performing that swap.
